original: 孫策得此計大喜，但恐袁術不願借兵，心想或許此刻正是父親遺物派上用場的時機，隔日便與袁術商談借兵之事。
text: Sun Ce was overjoyed with this plan, but he was afraid that Yuan Shu would not borrow troops. He thought that maybe it was the moment when his father's relics came in handy. The next day he discussed with Yuan Shu about borrowing troops.
